description: The goal of the course is to acquire the knowledge, skills, and understandings necessary to develop, implement and assess a K-5 general music program. The course emphasizes current approaches such as those of Orff, Dalcroze and Kodaly as well as intercultural and interdisciplinary learning. Optional field experience component. Offered annually in the spring semester. Prerequisite: EDUC 330.
name: Teaching Music-Elementary Schools
notes: Open to Juniors and Seniors only. Prerequisite: EDUC 330.

title: Teaching of Music in the Elementary School
